ISSUE.TITLE: DNS verification OK even when DNS record missing
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The now CLI won't complain even if the DNS records are completely empty (tested with CloudFlare DNS). I'd expect it complain if the DNS can't resolve the concerned domain. ``` $ now alias my.domain -r rules.json > my.domain is a custom domain. > Verifying the DNS settings for my.domain (see https://zeit.world for help) > Verification OK! ```
